name: caption-generator
description: AI-Powered Social Media Caption Generator with Analytics

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:setup: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
